user_request: Search for Italian restaurants on Maps
screen_desc: The screenshot displays the Google Maps app interface. At the top, there is a search bar for location searches and voice commands. The main area prompts users to "Explore nearby," while the bottom features tabs for "Explore," "Go" (to access commutes and favorite trips), and "Saved." The icons allow easy navigation through different features of the app.
history_actions: click on the Maps icon located at the upper right.

think_action.Thought: The Google Maps interface is visible, and the user wants to search for Italian restaurants. Since the search bar is at the top of the screen, the next step would be to use the search bar to enter the query for 'Italian restaurants.'
Future Action Plan: Click on the search bar to enter text.
Type 'Italian restaurants' in the search bar.
Execute the search and wait for the results.
